desc: ZZem Screw is a patented technology that provides revolutionary home security, door reinforcement and home repair. ZZem Screw extends the holding power of screws in hinges and latches deep into the door framing, reinforcing the weak points of your doors and protecting your home from forced entry.

layout.text: ZZEM SCREW PREVENTS FORCED DOOR ENTRY BY SECURING YOUR HARDWARE TO THE FRAME OF THE HOUSE, NOT JUST TO THE FRAME OF THE DOOR.
